SectionBody.Text: All fees of any nature collected by the office pursuant to this chapter shall be disbursed as follows:

Subsection.Text: The office shall transfer the amount of fees required to be deposited into the Securities Guaranty Fund pursuant to s. 517.131;

After the transfer required in subsection (1), the office shall transfer the $50 assessment fee collected from each associated person under s. 517.12(10) and (11) and 30.44 percent of the $100 assessment fee paid by dealers and investment advisors for each office in the state under s. 517.12(10) and (11) to the Regulatory Trust Fund; and
All remaining fees shall be deposited into the General Revenue Fund.
